title: Sheriff but you start five nights earlier

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is a member of an evil faction or a Neutral Killing role, you will learn that they are suspicious. Otherwise, you will learn that they are innocent.
- At the start of the game, you have five free interrogations. You will get the results at the start of D1.

desc:
Post 3673
*ZAGE ROLE I FOUND YOU SUS*
